ygData.subject: Re: Wow, I want this.........
ygData.msgSnippet: Dropped from Lord Nagafen................Runed Bolster Belt: +10 Str, +10 Sta, +10 Dex - Effect: Haste This must be the ultimate item for any melee class to
ygData.messageBody:
Dropped from Lord Nagafen................Runed Bolster Belt:

+10 Str, +10 Sta, +10 Dex - Effect: Haste

This must be the ultimate item for any melee class to get. And I thought my
Troll hide belt was good 8P

Madagan, Bard of 30 songs.
